text: [Ej mu'minon] Şumoro ci peş omadaast, ki dar mavridi [tarzi raftor ʙo] munofiqon du gurūh şudaed, hol on ki Alloh taolo ononro ʙa xotiri on ci ançom dodaand, sarnagun soxta [va ʙa kufru gumrohī ʙozgardonda] ast? Ojo mexohed, kasero, ki Alloh taolo gumroh kardaast, hidojat kuned? Va [-le] har kiro Alloh taolo gumroh kunad, rohe [ʙa sūji hidojat] ʙarojaş naxohī joft
